name: C.L.E.A.N
description:
C.L.E.A.N is a horror cleaning simulator set on a space station overrun with aliens

All of the crew have been murdered by aliens that have overrun the ship, but you don't care, you're just a cleaning robot. You have to stick to your programming and clean up all of the dead crew member's corpses while trying to avoid being killed by the aliens yourself.

Key features:

-Stealth gameplay

-Horror elements

-Gameplay inspired by viscera cleanup detail

Links:

-Watch me talk about the development of this game on YouTube!

-Look out for more of my games on Twitter!

Music credits:
